title: Tesla hikes Model 3 prices in Europe due to tariffs on China-made EVs
description: Tesla has increased prices of its Model 3 cars in several European countries, including Germany, the Netherlands, and Spain, by approximately 1,500 euros ($1,622). This price hike comes in response to new tariffs imposed by the European Union on electric vehicles (EVs) manufactured in China, where Tesla produces its Model 3 vehicles.
